description:
Power-Tek Group, a leading Ottawa commercial multi-trade contractor is looking for an experienced Plumber to join its growing team.
Responsibilities:

 Knowledge of reading drawings and specifications, primarily Mechanical drawings
 Roughing and Installations for pipe connections, fixtures, and equipment
 Installing, repairing, and maintaining domestic, commercial plumbing and heating systems
 Installations, modifications, repairs of various piping systems including Copper, PEX, PVC, XFR, Black pipe and Cast Iron
 Measuring, cutting, bending, and installing pipes using hand and power tools
 Testing for Quality Assurance

Requirements

 Must be registered with the Ontario College of Trades in the Plumbing or Pipe Fitter trade (Apprentice or Journeyman/Journeywoman Status)
 Experience working on construction sites
 Excellent communication skills (written and verbal)
 Ability to work within a team environment
 Attention to detail
 Always work in a safe manner
 High Health & Safety standards

Job Type: Full-time
Salary: $45.00-$50.00 per hour
Benefits:

 Dental care
 Extended health care
 RRSP match

Schedule:

 8 hour shift

Work Location: In person
